bugs.title: Intent parser lacks context-aware ADD vs UPDATE logic
bugs.description: Intent parser defaults to ADD actions even when user is stating current values that should UPDATE existing entries. Example: User says 'housing loan of 20k' but already has 85k loan - should UPDATE to 20k, not ADD 20k. Parser needs to distinguish between increase/decrease operations vs setting absolute values.
bugs.approach: Requires: (1) API call to retrieve current financial state before intent parsing, (2) Comparison logic to determine ADD vs UPDATE vs INCREASE/DECREASE based on context, (3) Updated intent parsing system to handle these scenarios with existing data context
bugs.impact: Users may accidentally duplicate financial entries instead of updating them
